brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts standards for the Physical Layer that specify signals, connectors, and cables.

Signals: Various digital signal forms are shown. Signal standards allow a variety of devices to interoperate.

Connectors: Network adapter modules are shown with I S O 8877 RJ-45 jacks.

Cables: UTP cables are shown next to a NIC with an RJ-45 adapter. Standards allow different companies to make cables and NIC's, knowing that they will work together.
